Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the widest hallway of the Tower Castle, built by Prince Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: There is a series of doors on the east side of the hall, some of which are open. They look like shops and stores. This castle has a lot of people living in it, and is almost a small city in its needs. Merchants are quite happy to meet that need, and have provided many services.
